page.title: 16Shops
page.content: In this area there is always a shop within easy reach. Many of the shops are mixed goods shops selling a wide variety of things. If we wanted to buy a common thing, such as milk or butter, there are a number of shops in which we could buy it locally. If it was less common, or more expensive, such as furniture, then we would usually have to go further. But there are also some specialist shops in the area. There is a knitting machine shop which is the only shop of its kind for miles around and which attracts customers from all over the town. People come to this shop to take lessons on the knitting machines.
